description: Guided by God, Jeanne helped the Dauphin and future French king secure victory over the English and led him to his coronation at Reims. She never gives up, willing to sacrifice everything for her country and her faith, fighting fiercely until her last breath.
victory_2: A monster like you does not deserve this beauty.
victory_4: For a wretched enemy such as you, even the stake is too good.
request: I beg of you, send me aid!
thanks: It is only right to stand for good.
ally_death: In another life, we could have been... I am so sorry.
congrats: Our enemies shall find only death.
boast: I will not rest until all is purified!
extra: My mother read me stories of your kingdom, and the omen of darkness.
siege: A monster like you does not deserve this beauty.
no_attack_1: I must not break my oath.
no_attack_2: I swore an oath, and I do not intend to break it.
team_winning: Our foes wither in the light of the blackened flame.
help_sent: I protect you from eternal darkness.
will_attack: Hold fast to your faith, today we fight side by side.
